entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blowing snow at times this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 49 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 47 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 12 January 2023
